name: Tennis Physics 3D Soccer Smash
description:
Tennis physics is a one-button 3d sports game. It offers fast and fluid gameplay and a huge range of unique player styles and characteristics to unlock and play.

In this game, all about your timing and your random skills. Easy and adorable gameplay waiting for you!

How To Play:
- Choose your favorite player and tennis court to play against your friend.
- Tap on a button to hit the ball towards the opponent.
- To gain a score point, you need to hit the ball twice on the opponent's ground and get the first 5 to win.
- Earn coins to unlock the new tennis players and courts.

Features:
- Addictive Gameplay with stunning 3d graphics.
- Ease one-button controller
- Each round things happen randomly
- Challenge your friends or play against CPU.
- App-optimized sports gameplay that is fun to master.
- Unlock free amateur, semi-pro, and pro tennis players.

The game provides a realistic simulation of tennis game matches, so find the best tennis strategy to become the virtual sports game star.
